org.turbogwt.net.http

Class MultipleParamStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.net.http.MultipleParamStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipleParamStrategy.CommaSeparatedStrategy, MultipleParamStrategy.RepeatedParamStrategy

    public abstract class MultipleParamStrategy
extends Object
    Class that defines how multiple values will be appended to the URI along with its param name.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MultipleParamStrategy.CommaSeparatedStrategy
      This class formats multiple parameters joining multiple values separated by comma.
      static class  MultipleParamStrategy.RepeatedParamStrategy
      This class formats multiple parameters repeating the parameter name.

    • Method Detail

      • asUriPart

        public abstract String asUriPart(String separator,
               String name,
               Object... values)
        Construct URI part from gives values.
        Parameters:
        separator - the separator of parameters from current URI part
        name - the parameter name
        values - the parameter value(s), each object will be converted to a String using its toString() method.
        Returns:
        URI part

      • assertNotNullOrEmpty

        protected void assertNotNullOrEmpty(String value,
                        String message)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Assert that the value is not null or empty.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        message - the message to include with any exceptions
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value is null
